name: Zippered Wristlet Handbag Organiser With Natural Linen
description:
This zippered pouch is a great way to organise your larger handbag, or, just pop in your phone, lippy and keys and your ready to go.

This pouch has a 7inch zipper and is 8inchs wide by 6 inches tall. 

Made from natural linen and a very popular Amy Butler print it is functional as well as stylish.  The wristlet is lined with a co-ordinating cotton print and the back is natural linen.

This pouch is made to order so please allow 2 to 3 days for me to make your item before shipping.  Fabric placement may differ to that of the photos but the pouch will still be made the exact same.

This pouch was made by me in my smoke and pet free studio.

Thanks for visiting my Shop!

I look forward to doing business with you!!

name: "Make a Wish" Cosmetic Makeup Zippered Pouch in Fun Modern Materials
description:
These fun Cosmetic/Makeup pouches are great for all of lifes essentials when you are on the go.  There is enough room for you makeup, combs, perfumes plus more!  The pouch is zippered to keep all of you things safe and sound.  It is fully lined and a Handmade Felt Flower with Glass Pearl Beads add a touch of class.  The outer is a quality designer cotton print in greys, aquas and blues, this is a unique gift for a loved one (or just a gift to yourself).

 Dimensions:

Height:14cm

Width: 19cm

Spotclean with damp cloth,  warm iron

 
This item will be made on purchase so please allow 2 to 3 days before shipping for me to make you item.  Fabric placement may vary to that of the photo but it will still be made exactly the same.
 

Thanks for visiting my little shop and I look forward to doing business with you!!

name: Natural Linen Zippered Handbag Organiser
description:
This zippered pouch is a great way to organise your larger handbag, or, just pop in your phone, lippy and keys and your ready to go.

This pouch has a 7inch zipper and is 8inchs wide by 6 inches tall. 

Made from natural linen and a quality cotton fabric in pale grey, blue and pumpkin print it is functional as well as stylish.  The wristlet is lined with a co-ordinating blue designer print cotton, the back is made from natural linen.  This pouch is fully interfaced for stability.

This pouch will be made to order so placement of fabric may vary to that shown but will be made exactly the same.  Please allow 2 to 3 days for me to make your item before I post it.

This pouch was made by me in my smoke and pet free studio.

Thanks for visiting my Shop!

name: Natural Linen Zippered Handbag Organiser with Vintage Lace
description:
This zippered pouch is a great way to organise your larger handbag, or, just pop in your phone, lippy and keys and your ready to go.

This pouch has a 7inch zipper and is 8inchs wide by 6 inches tall. 

Made from natural linen and a quality cotton fabric from Amy Butler's Soul Blossoms range, it is just right for spring.  The cotton lace adds a touch of vintage class.  The wristlet is lined with a co-ordinating pink designer print cotton and the back is made from natural linen.  This pouch is fully interfaced for stability.

This pouch is made to order so please allow 2 to 3 days for me to make your item before shipping.  Fabric placement may vary to the photo but it will still be made exactly the same.

This would make a perfect gift to yourself or a loved one!

 

This pouch was made by me in my smoke and pet free studio.

Thanks for visiting my Shop!
